abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Financial Sector
            Technical Assistance Project is to facilitate the
            implementation of the policy and institutional reforms
            envisaged under the Financial Sector Adjustment Credit by:
            1) strengthening the capabilities of the key financial and
            regulatory institutions; 2) assisting in the establishment
            of new, temporary institutions that will effect the
            restructuring/liquidation of major banks; 3) extending the
            new accounting infrastructure; and 4) training bank
            personnel. The project will provide financing for a number
            of technical assistance activities designed to implement
            reforms in the financial sector to transform it into a
            well-functioning and efficient financial system capable of
            meeting the evolving requirements of a market-oriented
            economy. It consists of the following components: 1)
            assistance to the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic; 2)
            bank restructuring and liquidation; 3) debt recovery and
            resolution; 4) payments and clearing systems; 5) central
            registry for pledges; 6) training; 7) non-bank financial
            institutions; 8) public debt instruments and securities; and
            9) rural finance.
